answers.answer: GD and blood pressure are two different things.  If you fail the 1 hour gd test then you will need to take the 3 hour.
They measure the way your bod reacts to sugar not your body temp
Wouldn't be surprised if the reason your blood pressure has been high is because your worrying about failing your GD test.

I freak out at every doctors appointment lol last time they couldn't tell my heartbeat apart fromMy baby's bc my heart was pounding sooo fast idk why I always get Like that she's perfectly fine but I can't help it
Ya totally understandable. I always take slow deep breaths when my blood pressure is taken ha ha.

question: what will happen if I fail my diabetes test ? My blood pressure been border line my last two visits does that mean I will most likely fail my test ?
title: GD TEST ?
